title: Couple with Heart: Person, Light Skin Tone, Man
alsoKnownAs: Couple with Heart (Person, Light Skin Tone, Man)
description: Represents a romantic couple, specifically a person with a light skin tone and a man, connected by a heart symbol. It signifies love, partnership, and affection between these two individuals.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the couple with heart emoji, featuring a person and a woman with light skin tones and no specific skin tone variation for the heart, presents a tender and loving embrace. Apple's signature smooth gradients and glossy finish give the figures a warm, inviting appearance, with the heart glowing gently between them. This emoji is a beautiful representation of romantic love, partnership, and deep affection.
